MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY11 postcode area of Dunfermline, affecting properties in Primrose Court and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10.08pm. Our engineers have arrived in the local area and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:29PM on Friday 26 March 2021.
